title: (x) Mike Colï¿½n - Typo Upright {BJ}
content:
My ID skills are a little too rusty to pick out this one for a buddy. Any help gang?   
   
 ![Photo Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20050525001904im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/40600.jpg)   
   
Thanks,   
Stuart :D
author: Diner

comments.content:
not exact, but it appears to be a riff on Typo Upright   
by Morris Fuller Benton.   
   
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/typo-upright/](http://web.archive.org/web/20050525001904/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/typo-upright/)

Agfa's [French Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20050525001904/http:/www.fonts.com/findfonts/detail.asp?pid=203226) is one such 'riff'. Another is [Linoscript](http://web.archive.org/web/20050525001904/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/linoscript/linoscript/testdrive.html?s=mike%2Bcolon&p=48), but it appears more like Benton's original.
